[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Downgrade Risk] If stats_level is changed from All to None during a network upgrade, can the removal of statistics cause RocksDB to deallocate buffers that are still in use, leading to crashes? (Medium)

(Low)

(High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Data Race] If the RocksdbConfig object is modified by another thread while gen_rocksdb_options() is reading its fields, can this cause torn reads or inconsistent option combinations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Memory Safety] Are all calls to db_opts methods (set_max_open_files, set_env, etc.) safe in concurrent contexts, or can they trigger data races in RocksDB's internal state? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Shared State] If multiple database instances created with these options share resources (like the Env), can concurrent operations on different databases cause state corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Negative Values] If config.max_open_files is assigned a negative value through integer underflow in upstream code, will RocksDB reject it or interpret it as a very large positive value? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Zero Values] If both config.max_open_files and config.max_total_wal_size are set to 0, can RocksDB enter a deadlock state where it cannot open files or write to WAL? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Boundary Values] Are there minimum/maximum safe values for max_open_files and max_total_wal_size that should be enforced? Can values outside these ranges cause RocksDB internal errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Option Conflicts] Can certain combinations of options (e.g., readonly=true with create_if_missing=true) create contradictory states that RocksDB cannot handle? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Type Coercion] When config.max_open_files (likely i32) is passed to set_max_open_files, can integer type conversions cause value truncation or sign extension bugs? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Silent Failures] Do any of the db_opts setter methods (set_max_open_files, set_env, etc.) return errors that are being ignored, potentially causing the database to open with unsafe default settings? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/rocksdb-options/src/lib.rs] [Function: gen_rocksdb_options()] [Environment Validation] If set_env() is called with an invalid or corrupted Env object, does it validate the environment or silently use a broken configuration? (High)
